wikipedia_page.main: Dame Judith Anne Macgregor  (née Brown; born 17 June 1952) is a British diplomat who was High Commissioner to South Africa from 2013 to 2017. She previously served as Ambassador to Slovakia from 2004 to 2007, and Ambassador to Mexico from 2009 to 2013.

response: *2003–2007: Judith MacgregorMACGREGOR, Judith Anne, Who's Who 2013, A & C Black, 2013; online edn, Oxford University Press, Dec 2012, accessed 5 Jan 2013
John Malcolm Macgregor is married to Judith Macgregor (née Brown), also a British ambassador. They have three sons and a daughter.
* Judith Macgregor  – High Commissioner, Pretoria, South Africa. For services to British diplomacy
